vpsissRszCfg Struct Reference

Resizer control structure, passed as an argument to VPS_ISS_IPIPE_IOCTL_CTRL. More...

#include <vps_cfgrsz.h>

Data Fields

vpsissRszInputConfig_t inCfg
 
vpsissRszInstConfig_t instCfg [VPS_ISS_RSZ_SCALER_MAX]
 

Detailed Description

Resizer control structure, passed as an argument to VPS_ISS_IPIPE_IOCTL_CTRL.

Field Documentation

vpsissRszInputConfig_t vpsissRszCfg::inCfg

Resizer input configuration, Used to set input processing window and resizer operational mode, horizontal and vertical scaling factor is calculated based on the output of the crop window Whenever, there is a change in cropCfg, scaling factor and other parameters are recalculated and set again.

vpsissRszInstConfig_t vpsissRszCfg::instCfg[VPS_ISS_RSZ_SCALER_MAX]

Pointer to Instance Configuration
